scenario.name: Group Call Originator
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:mcptt@[remote_ip]:[remote_port];transport=[transport] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 To: MCPTT-Server <sip:mcptt@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> From: mcptt_c1 <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] REGISTER User-Agent: MCPTT-UA Allow: INVITE,ACK,BYE,CANCEL,OPTIONS,NOTIFY,SUBSCRIBE,INFO,MESSAGE,REFER Content-Length: 0
